title: So I'm working off a google sheets page at work
body:
I made a copy of the document so I could work on it within my own work flow that way all the coworkers wouldn't be undoing my personalized edits so I could keep track of the data as i go through it

Someone went through and undid all my highlights in my copy-of sheet, they keep dragging and dropping my columns, Every time i make an alt sheet to work off of they just follow me over to it, As a professional i can't tell them to go eat flaming bleach bricks til they die the way i want to

How the fuck am i supposed to keep track of this sheet and my progress in it if they keep undoing my tracker highlights

what's worse is these fuckers keep undoing my notes which are things like "server error-revisit" so now i have to go back through hundreds of fucking rows of spreadsheet that is 99% complete and crosscheck them with the outside apps that i'm inputting this fucking data into

REEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEE
